1using System;

9namespace Y.Negoci
10{
14 internal class TagNegoci
15 {
16 //Atributs
17 private TagModel tag;
18 //Propietats
19 public TagModel Tag
20 {
21 get { return tag; }
22 set { tag = value;
23 tag.Nom = FormatarString(tag.Nom); }
24 }
25 //Metodes
31 public TagModel GetTagDB(int id)
32 {
33 return TagDB.GetTag(id);
34 }
40 public static int GetTag_id(string tag_name)
41 {
42 tag_name = FormatarString(tag_name);
43 int id = TagDB.GetTag_Id(tag_name);
44 return id;
45 }
50 public List<int> ObtenirTotsId()
51 {
52 return TagDB.ObtenirTotsId();
53 }
57 public void Inserir()
58 {
59 try
60 {
61 if (!Validar()) throw new Exception();
62 TagDB.Inserir(tag);
63 }
64 catch
65 {
66 MessageBox.Show("ERROR AL VALIDAR/INSERIR TAG A LA BASE DE DADES");
67 }
68 }
73 public bool Validar()
74 {
75 if(Tag == null) return false;
76 if(this.HasNull() ) return false;
77 return true;
78 }
83 public bool HasNull()
84 {
85 return Tag.Nom == null || Tag.Nom == "";
86 }
92 public static bool Existeix(string nom)
93 {
94 nom = FormatarString(nom);
95 return (TagDB.ObtenirTotsId().Contains(GetTag_id(nom)));
96 }
102 public bool Existeix(TagModel tag)
103 {
104 return (TagDB.ObtenirTotsId().Contains(tag.Tag_id));
105 }
111 public static string FormatarString(string tag_name)
112 {
113 if (tag_name == null) return "";
114 return tag_name.Substring(0, 1).ToUpper() + tag_name.Substring(1).ToLower();
115 }
116 }
117}
